title: Elyse's Analytic Enchantments
description: Elyse's magic training continues, teaching you about useful built-in methods to analyse arrays.

tests.name: Card is first
tests.description_html: Return the position of the first card.

tests.name: Card not found
tests.description_html: Return -1 if the card is not found.

tests.name: Card is found
tests.description_html: Check if a specific card is in the stack.

tests.name: Card not found
tests.description_html: Check if a card not in the stack returns false.

tests.name: All cards even
tests.description_html: Check if all cards are even.

tests.name: Some cards odd
tests.description_html: Return false if any card is odd.

tests.name: Includes odd card
tests.description_html: Return true if there is an odd card.

tests.name: No odd card
tests.description_html: Return false if there are no odd cards.

tests.name: Find even card position
tests.description_html: Return the position of the first even card.

tests.name: No even card
tests.description_html: Return -1 when no even card exists.
